name: Project.99_1705
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 3 games.

[Sound Editor] by Jaewon Yoo, Jooeun Hwang

Make changes on the environment by adding sound effects to the video and lead the hero to his destination.

[16x16] by Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang

A musical experience which inspired by Tenori-on and other launchpad interface.

[to9ether.io] by Jaehyun Yoo, Jooeun Hwang

Sometimes we have to lean to each other. Here is your chance. Unique online multiplayer game that allows you to control only Left/Right or Up/Down for a character. You need somebody to control the other part of the character. One client for Left/Right and other for Up/Down.
